english: I believe in a higher power.
I am interested in different religions.
I believe in the importance of faith.
I am on a spiritual journey.
I believe in life after death.
I am a member of a religious community.
I believe in the golden rule: treat others as you want to be treated.
arabic: أؤمن بالقاعدة الذهبية: عامل الآخرين كما تحب أن يعاملوك.

english: I am grateful for the opportunity to learn about different faiths.
arabic: أنا ممتن للفرصة للتعرف على الأديان المختلفة.
